name: Medusa's Lament
description:
Times are hard for snake ladies lately.  Since she can't very well go grocery shopping, Medusa has planted a garden.  But those vile fat crows have struck again! So for no reason, Medusa decides to create a tower of their statues and see how high up she can get. Makes sense to me. Ludum Dare #9 was themed "Build The Level You Play", so you can see how that applies to this game.

* Made in 48 hours (doesn't help you any, but aren't you impressed?)

* Creepy weird music

* Fat crows

* Includes complete source code if you'd like to learn how it was made
